text: Ezɨ kɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn gari, bizir igharagha garim otifi, ezɨ kɨ bar dɨgavir kuram gami. Kɨ 7 plan enselbar gari, me ikia egha 7 plan bizir bar kurar gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨzibar suiki. Eghtɨ 7 plan bizir kurar kaba gɨvaghtɨ, ua igharaziba otivan kogham, kamagh amizɨ, bizir kurar 7 plan kabanangɨn gɨn, Godɨn anɨngagharim bar gɨvagham.
